trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around July 22nd 2006
Summary: disc being chased by 2 fighter planes
divs: Sighting Detailsin the afternoon i was in my backyard doing some gardening in south east portland and heard noisy engines . looked up and saw white lighted disc being chased by 2 fighter planes. the disc ducked into a cloud ( there wasnt many of them that day, only a couple of little clouds) and the 2 fighter planes followed into the clouds. the disc disappeared behind the cloud (during this i debated whether i should go get my camera, but decided not to because maybe i would miss the disc coming out from behind the cloud). never seen the disc come back out, only the 2 planes. the disc did not have any engine noise . i saw all of this as clear as a bell. im not sure of the date. wish i would have written it down, it was the summer of 2006, i think. i am positive of what i seen in the sky. i was awed by the experience. the reason i didnt write the date down was that every one i told did not believe it.
